entries.description: logging: `aws.viewLogsAtMessage` no longer fails when the log message cannot be found
SAM: the `Sync SAM Application` command remembers your most recent selections per-region.

SAM: deployment of CloudFormation templates now uses `sam sync` by default, reducing the amount of time it takes to deploy to AWS. The `aws.samcli.legacyDeploy` setting can be used to revert to the old experience.
